author: Keegan Pope
title: USC Football: Breaking down the Trojans elite recruiting class
text:
USC Football Recruiting: Trojans building an elite 2026 class
After consecutive cycles ranked No. 15 or lower in the On3 Industry Football Team Recruiting Rankings, USC is looking to bounce back with what could become the best class of the Lincoln Riley era.
At the beginning of June, the Trojans hold the country’s No. 1 class and a whopping 28 commitments — nearly double what every other Power 4 program in the country has in their own classes. One checks in as a five-star, while 17 more check in as four-stars and another 10 check in as three-stars. And a number of those are on the cusp of attaining blue-chip status.
USC has seen a few departures from the group, notable five-star linebacker Xavier Griffin, who opted to decommit last month. He was one of two early five-star commits, along Rancho Cucamonga (Calif.) CB RJ Sermons, who joined the class on Dec. 13. He opted to graduate early and reclassify up a year to USC’s 2025 class on May 23.
It didn’t take Riley and Co. long to find another elite prospect though, as five-star tight end Mark Bowman pledged to the Trojans exactly a week later. He joins a group headlined by top-100 quarterback Jonas Williams, who USC flipped away from rival Oregon. They also poached four-star defensive lineman Tomuhini Topui from the Ducks, as well as beating them out for elite offensive tackle Keenyi Pepe.
In total, more than half of the Trojans’ class hails from the Golden State (63%), and 63% of current commits are blue-chip prospects in the On3 Industry Ranking. Alongside Bowman, Pepe, and Williams, USC has top-100 commitments from CB Elbert Hill (No. 39), EDGE Simote Katoanga (No. 65), CB Brandon Lockhart (No. 71), and DL Jaimeon Winfield (No. 95).

author: 小浪财讯
title: 证券ETF龙头（560090）跌1.55%，半日成交额6915.69万元|证券ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，证券ETF龙头（560090）跌1.55%，报1.143元，成交额6915.69万元。证券ETF龙头（560090）重仓股方面， 中信证券 截止午盘跌1.55%， 东方财富 跌2.19%， 国泰海通 跌0.65%， 华泰证券 跌1.93%， 招商证券 跌1.31%， 东方证券 跌1.89%， 广发证券 跌1.98%， 申万宏源 跌1.45%， 兴业证券 跌1.66%， 中金公司 跌1.91%。
证券ETF龙头（560090）业绩比较基准为 中证全指证券公司指数 收益率，管理人为汇添富基金管理股份有限公司，基金经理为董瑾，成立（2023-02-27）以来回报为16.16%，近一个月回报为1.41%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: صحيفة الراي الكويتية
title: وفاة شخص وإجلاء أكثر من 100 جراء أمطار غزيرة في كوريا الجنوبية
text:
مشاهدة وفاة شخص وإجلاء أكثر من 100 جراء أمطار غزيرة في كوريا الجنوبية
يذكر بـأن الموضوع التابع لـ وفاة شخص وإجلاء أكثر من 100 جراء أمطار غزيرة في كوريا الجنوبية قد تم نشرة ومتواجد على صحيفة الراي الكويتية وقد قام فريق التحرير في برس بي بالتاكد منه وربما تم التعديل علية وربما قد يكون تم نقله بالكامل اوالاقتباس منه ويمكنك قراءة ومتابعة مستجدادت هذا الخبر او الموضوع من مصدره الاساسي.
وختاما نتمنى ان نكون قد قدمنا لكم من موقع Pressbee تفاصيل ومعلومات، وفاة شخص وإجلاء أكثر من 100 جراء أمطار غزيرة في كوريا الجنوبية.
في الموقع ايضا :

author: Angelo Guinhawa Athlon Sports
title: Caitlin Clark's Video With New Teammate is Turning Heads
text:
Sports
Caitlin Clark’s Video With New Teammate is Turning Heads
The WNBA is just two months away from the start of its 2025 season, so naturally, teams and their players are starting to get back to work. The Indiana Fever are no exception, especially since they brought in a lot of new faces to improve their roster.
What turned a lot of heads on Wednesday, however, was the Fever's latest post featuring their new player in Brianna Turner and second-year guard Caitlin Clark.
After officially introducing Turner as a member of the Fever, the defensive star apparently had a workout with Clark.
The Fever shared a video showing some of the highlights from their practice session together, including Clark dishing out a perfect assist to Turner for a layup.
Sure enough, fans loved how the two quickly got to work. The video also further intensified the excitement that fans feel for the new season.
"Oh yes we getting that [ship] this season! Go Fever!" a commenter wrote. Another one said, "Omg someone is actually setting a pick for CC?? Yall … it's over for the league."
A fan added, "Awesome happy to see Caitlin."
"Lab work. Turner is much more athletic then we think. Girl can block shots! And very nice catching ally ooooops," a commenter shared.
A fifth supporter claimed, "We winning it all this year."
"Let's go! So pump can't wait to have everyone back in Indy," a follower excitedly said.
WNBA training camp begins on April 27, while the 2025 regular season kicks off on May 16. With that said, the wait shouldn't be too long for Fever fans to see Caitlin Clark work fully with her new teammates.
Aside from Turner, the Fever also added Sydney Colson, Natasha Howard, DeWanna Bonner, Jaelyn Brown and Sophie Cunningham this offseason.
Indeed, it will be interesting to see Clark play with her new teammates and how the Fever's improved roster will help the team.
Related: New ‘Insane' Caitlin Clark Stat Has WNBA Fans at Each Other's Throats
